Name: De Kompaszaal

Name: De Kompaszaal
Review Text: While the food is not special, the whole restaurant is seemingly direct from 1960. Friendly staff and lovely views, a mesmerizing aquarium, all in a super retro atmosphere.

Name: De Kompaszaal
Review Text: Beautiful authentic space — gorgeous view — friendly people — great food

Name: De Kompaszaal
Review Text: With its authentic look, it already a joy to walk in. When you go up the winding stairs and enter the _zaal' the atmosphere is complete. Every Friday there is live jazz and dance if you want. Enjoy a great beer selection as well as snacks and a gr at terrace towards the setting sun

Name: De Kompaszaal
Review Text: I've been here for Salsa Dancing, I believe they have a salsa night once a month, definitively the crowd is nice but a little bit older, I will say over 45 years old in average. If you like live music, this is the place to be, and if you are over 40, then this is the place for you.

Name: De Kompaszaal
Review Text: Nice historic venue to enjoy a cup of coffee, lunch or dinner. Nice wines too. Go up the stairs and you'll find a restaurant that looks like beamed over from the 50's from the 20th century. The views from their balcony are amazing.

Name: De Kompaszaal
Review Text: If you want to throw a party,  this is the perfect spot. Interesting and spacious space over looking the harbor and the villages in Amsterdam Nord. Excellent party food and friendly staff.
